title: Bath Time
description: Bath Time describes how a young girl has fun during bath time. This story entertains readers through its descriptive text and humorous illustrations of a child's bath time routine. Students will have the opportunity to connect to prior knowledge while identifying causes and effects. The book can also be used to teach students about complete sentences.
meta: bath, bubbles, slips, time, tub, tugboat
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Short Vowel Sounds : Discriminate short vowel /u/ sound
Complete Sentences : Understand the purpose of complete sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
